reviews.text: Despite reviews stating that the rooms were tiny, we found the room to be of adequate size, immaculately clean, and sufficient for our needs. The staff was nice and very helpful and the breakfast buffet provided us with the necessary fuel to begin each day of exploring this wonderful city. The only negative I'd say was the lack of shower curtain made it difficult to bathe without getting water on the floor. It is close to the metro station and there is a little grocery store by the hotel that you can get snacks and bottle watered inexpensively. We had a great experience staying at the Floride Etoile and recommend it to our friends.
reviews.title: Nice little friendly hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Myself and my girlfriend are just back fom Paris and our stay in this hotel was fine. We arrived at the hotel at 1pm and I was a little taken aback to be told that our room wasn't ready and wouldn't be ready for a couple of hours (check-in time is 1pm). I was thinking to myself what had we got ourselves into.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel
